sentences.en: A unified ideological level is mainly attributed to " oust others doctrines , the overwhelming Confucianism. "
sentences.cn: 大一统归于思想层面主要是 “ 罢黜百家,独尊儒术 ”.

sentences.en: Baby cuckoos oust other baby birds from their nests.
sentences.cn: 布谷鸟的雏鸟把其他鸟的雏鸟逐出巢外.
法官周二上午裁定佛州重计票期限.

sentences.en: Don't try to outshine others. They can oust you from office , mind you.
sentences.cn: 你别太突出了,小心别人掐你的尖儿.

sentences.en: Given another year it might have been harder to oust Mr Profumo.
sentences.cn: 如果再有一年,要想撵走普罗夫莫先生可能会比较困难.

sentences.en: He survived numerous plots to kill or oust him.
sentences.cn: 他经历了无数次谋杀或取缔他的阴谋,他都挺过来了!

sentences.en: ROBERT MUGABE appears once again to have wrong - footedvt those who have been trying to oust him.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特?穆加贝看来再一次让那些一直试图赶他下台的人手忙脚乱.

sentences.en: Take care that quantity does not oust quality.
sentences.cn: 注意不要一味追求数量而忽视质量.

sentences.en: The leaders have been ousted from power by nationalists.
sentences.cn: 那些领导人已被民族主义者赶下了台。

sentences.en: The legislative body had voted to oust the country's onetime rulers.
sentences.cn: 立法机构通过投票将该国的前度领导人赶下了台。

sentences.en: The president has gone along with the hardliners lest they be tempted to oust him.
sentences.cn: 总统同意了强硬派的意见，以免他们产生赶他下台的念头。

sentences.en: The Republicans may oust him in November.
sentences.cn: 共和党人可能在11月罢免他。

sentences.en: They want to burn K yoto to the ground and oust the Emperor to Edo!
sentences.cn: 他们要烧掉京都然后帮将军篡位!

trans.tran_en: If someone is ousted from a position of power, job, or place, they are forced to leave it
